scripts.say: Just prior to the Royal Navy embarking on the Siren hunt
So... the green one means "Siren base found and destroyed," blue means "requesting support," and red means "Sardegnians have betrayed us," if I'm not mistaken?
That's it. Could you please load your cannons with them now?
Of course! Now I need to come up with a name for this manoeuvre... hmm... I'll have to do it later, for we're short on time.
Indeed, the Sardegnians will be grouping up with us any minute now. No matter what happens, God save the Queen.
Say York actually does fire the red flare to signal she's been attacked... what happens then, Illustrious?
I can only hope that it doesn't come to that...
But, if it does happen, we will simply have to spank some naughty children~
